page.title: 10A BARNARD CASTLE BARBER
page.content: Barnard Castle is one of the few places where a business like mine survives.I am a barber, no appointments,you sit and chat while you wait your turn.My main instruments are scissors,comb and electric clippers.No perms,shampoos or blow dries.Haircuts only,perhaps a beard or eyebrow trim.I visit people's homes to cut their hair or even to shave them. Mostly,my customers are farmers and older men,but I do get children and teenagers wanting crewcuts and skinhead styles and I try to oblige.My prices are low compared to modern salons,Â£1.10 for adults and Â£1 for children.I have one week's holiday a year,when I close my shop.I'll never make a fortune,but I enjoy my work.
